name: Faint
content: I am a little bit of loneliness
有一点冷漠有一些抱怨
但是我逃避事实每个人都可以看到这些伤痕
I am what I want you to want
What I want you to feel
L But it s like no matter what I do
但这就像无论我做什么
To just believe this is real
Turn your back like you always do
你像你总是做的那样不肯帮助我
Face away and pretend thatI m not
但是我会来的因为我得到过你的一切
I can't feel the way I did before
我无法忍受我之前的方式
Don't turn your back on me
我无法忍受我之前的方式
Time won t heal this damage anymore
时间不会保证不再有伤害
Don't turn your back on me
I am a little bit insecure
Cause you don't understand I do
I am what you never wanna say
But I ve never had a doubt
It s like no matter what I do
For once just to hear me out
就这一次听我把话说完
Turn your back like you always do
像你总是做的那样不肯帮助我
Face awayand pretend that I m not
Cause you re allthat I ve got
因为我得到过你的一切
I can't feel the way I did before
我不能忍受我之前的方式
Don't turn your back on me
Time won t heal this damage anymore
Don't turn your back on me
你要听我说完不管你喜欢与否
你要听我说完不管你喜欢与否
我不能忍受我之前的方式
I can't feel the way I did before
我不能忍受我之前的方式
Don't turn your back on me
Time won t heal this damage anymore
Don't turn your back on me
Don't turn your back on me
Don't turn your back on me
